definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: In China it has risen from 4kg to 54.
sentences.chinese: 中国肉类的人均年消费量从仅4千克达到了54千克。

sentences.english: And for one kilogram of Chinese leaves, half would be discarded before packaging.
sentences.chinese: 一千克的大白菜，在包装之前，一半会被丢弃。

sentences.english: The jar will hold a kilo.
The fuel bank with capacity of 108 kg of petrol, is located in the upper part of the cabin.
sentences.chinese: 108千克储量的油箱位于驾驶室顶部。

sentences.english: The fisherman weighed the fish and it weighed 150 kgs.
sentences.chinese: 那个渔夫称了鱼，鱼重大150千克。

sentences.english: So it's moles per weight of solvent.
sentences.chinese: 就是每千克溶剂的溶质摩尔数。

sentences.english: The farm s fruit crop amounted to about 700000 kg. this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年这个农场的水果收了约七十万千克。

sentences.english: It's said that we eat about 27000 kilos of food during our lives.
sentences.chinese: 据说我们一生可以吃掉大约27000千克的食物。

sentences.english: The single coil can be 50kg to 800kg for customers' choice.
sentences.chinese: 单线圈可以从五十千克到800千克，有客户选择。

sentences.english: The unit price is USD 15.00 per kilogram.
sentences.chinese: 在这儿，单位价格是每千克15美元。

sentences.english: And it's the biggest white truffle of 2008, weighing in just over a kilo.
sentences.chinese: 这是2008年最大的白松露菌，重达一千克有余。

sentences.english: Then Mocky asked Ken to add one kilogram of butter to the flour.
sentences.chinese: 加一千克的黄油放入面粉里，肯。

sentences.english: Annual production of frog oils is about 40000 kg.
sentences.chinese: 年产林蛙油4万千克左右。
